lines.text: Maybe they... really needed that hay gone for some reason?
Maybe it could reveal their supplier, somehow? They wanted to keep that person's identity secret, in case the cops showed up?
...Hm. Well, worth lookin' into, but I get the feelin' there's more to it than that.
Hey, Steelspeaker. I want a detail lookin' into anyone who might've supplied livestock and feed to someone in the city.
...Yeah, found at the scene. Lots. Could be a paper trail.
...Don't think so. Hobby farmin' ain't huge inside the walls. Might turn up somethin'.
...Still, I want you to keep lookin' into other motives here.
